issue.title: [C++] Also build static libraries for leaf libraries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-303](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-303). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`libarrow_io` should also build a static library to give linkers the option to use either variant
